definition: to peel with a knife/to pare/to cut (a ball at tennis etc)

sentences.english: You will also face heartbreak and abandonment by those you love.
sentences.chinese: 你同样吸烟削尖削尖时刻以及你深爱的人的抛弃。

sentences.english: You will also face heartbreak and abandonment by those you love.
sentences.chinese: 你同样吸烟削尖削尖时刻以及你深爱的人的抛弃。

sentences.english: He tapered the end of the fence post with an axe.
sentences.chinese: 他用斧子把栅栏的一头削尖。

sentences.english: My daughter points a pencil with a knife.
sentences.chinese: 我女儿用小刀削尖铅笔。

sentences.english: Software Description: About Sword, This screen saver depicts sword actions like chopping, piercing, snapping and pointing.
sentences.chinese: 这个屏幕保护程序描绘击剑运动，刺穿，猛咬和削尖。

sentences.english: The pupil tapered one end of the pencil with a knife.
sentences.chinese: 小学生用刀把铅笔的一头削尖了。

sentences.english: School does not have to be grueling to be good.
sentences.chinese: 学校们并不需要削尖脑袋成为最好的。

sentences.english: They dig for vegetables with sharpened sticks and eat their food off banana leaves.
sentences.chinese: 他们用削尖的棍子挖掘野菜，用香蕉叶盛他们的食物。

sentences.english: Taper the plug off a bit with a chisel so that it will sit into the hole.
sentences.chinese: 用凿子把这塞子一头削尖点，使它能塞进孔里。
这九支铅笔都是削尖了的。

sentences.english: Sharpen your pencils before the test.
sentences.chinese: 考试前把你的铅笔都削尖。

sentences.english: The lead broke on this pencil, so I have to sharpen it.
sentences.chinese: 这枝铅笔的笔芯断了，所以我只好削尖它。

sentences.english: He sharpened the pencil and began to draw the beautiful setting on a sheet of paper.
sentences.chinese: 他削尖铅笔，在纸上将优美的环境描绘下来。

sentences.english: He saw a piece of wood that he had sharpened the prior afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 他看到了一根前一天下午他削尖了的木头。

sentences.english: Someone slips a sharpened nail into Trumpet’s hands.
sentences.chinese: 其中一人悄悄递了一只削尖的钉子到他手中。

definition: the shaft of a pen or writing brush/pen-holder/pen
a saw/to cut with a saw
toadying for personal gain/to curry favor/to study in great depth
